data.text:
Courtney Laine Mazza and Mario Lopez are since 2012. Mario is the best actor known for his popular series roles. He married Ali Landry, an actress for two weeks. But later he married Courtney Laine Mazza in 2012 and will celebrate in December their 10 anniversary.

Mario is 49 and Courtney is 38 and they are together for the past 10 years. They have a strong bond and are a sweet couple. They began from a wedding celebration televised and now with a family. They enjoyed many monumental and memorable experiences.

Courtney is an actress and dancer. She has added radio show hosting and it is a show of their own done by Mario and Courtney. They discuss entertainment news and pop culture.

Courtney keeps and wishes to stay private with her life and then shares adorable posts regularly on Instagram. She highlights special occasions to show they were on vacations.

How did Mario and Courtney meet?

Courtney and Mario are the lovebirds. They met in a Broadway production in 2008, A Chorus Line. They were dating and married after four years in Punta Mita, a ceremony. It was aired as Mario and Courtneys Wedding Fiesta. In this wedding the flower girl Gia was their daughter and Mario said he wishes to expand their family.

Now they have three children, starting with Gia in 2010, sons Dominic in 2013 and in 2019 Santino. Mario admitted that they both have an active sex life. They expect to have more babies in the future.

Mario was married earlier to actress Ali Landry. They dated before marriage for six years and then got into the knot in April 2004 in Mexico. Their marriage did not last long; it was only after two weeks Mario accepted to Ali that he was cheating her even at his bachelor party.

Mario was hanging out with other women and Ali came to know through photos leaked by her sister. She asked Mario and he confessed the seriousness he did not have with anyone. He had to handle a lot of drama at that point and finally he got the guts to say, I am sorry and I am not ready right now.

The two separated ways and Mario moved on to dating his professional dancer, Courtney Laine Mazza.
